t: Amazon Pay with Chase - Amazon Pay
s: Amazon Pay will now offer you the convenience of equal monthly payment options on eligible purchases of $50 or more. You can enjoy 0% APR financing for 6 or 12 months at tens of thousands of retailers when you select Amazon Pay and use your Amazon Visa or Prime Visa at checkout.
